question: As per the Transport Ministry, a Multi-model Logistics park is set to be constructed in which North- East state by 2022?
explanation:
Union Minister for Road Transport and Highways Nitin Gadkari has recently announced that a multi-model logistics park will be constructed in Silchar.
It will be constructed in the Silchar-Saurashtra Highway by March 2022. He also announced that construction works of East-West Corridor would be fast-tracked and two new bridges would be built over the Barak river.
